sourcesContent:
<template> 
    <v-select @search="getUser" :options="userList" label="user_" @update:modelValue="$emit('update:modelValue',$event)"/>
</template>
<script>
import vSelect from "vue-select"
import {Application} from "@/api"
export default{
    name:"select-user",
    props:['modelValue'],
    components:{
        vSelect,
    },
    data(){
        return {
            userList:[],
        }
    },
    methods:{
        async getUser(search){
            let params={username__icontains:search}
            let data = await Application.objects.filter(params)
            this.userList = data.results
        },
    },
    mounted(){
        this.getUser()
    }
}
</script>
